page.title: 16A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: Today,is the 4th. of July 1985_Wednesday.It is nice and warm and sunny. Two weeks from now we are going to be breaking up from school and as we are in the Fourth Year,we will be going to {Secondary Scool}after the summer holiday.Our teacher is leaving as well to be a headmaster of another school Part of our day,we sit on a chair,at a desk with a lid on.We put our books,pencils and pens in the desk.The desk and chair are made of{wood}.We do work like Maths and English Language.Our classroom is in the basement,partly underground.There are 33 children in our class. Victoria Robinson.
